data.name: Pathless Woods
data.detailed_description:
About Us

We are a team of two from Guangdong, China (started out working solo and ended up as a couple). Out of our love for games, we have developed “Pathless Woods”, inspired by Byron’s poem. There is a pleasure in the pathless woods, to embrace nature with its endless spring of inspiration; to express with abandon in the face of nature. We hope that every player can experience nature and the joys of survival in this mini world!

Follow Us on:
Twitter
Facebook
Youtube
Discord


About the Game

About This Game


You have stumbled upon a sealed land by a twist of fate. While everything appears refreshing and bright, a mysterious breath lurks around. This place, shrouded in an unknown fog, is known as the Pathless Woods. Embrace the challenges from various biomes such as mysterious ruins, dangerous beasts, and the evil Jaer cultists who post a threat on everyone. Explore the world and find your way to survive while fending off dangers by working with the surroundings, utilizing resources, and building networks with locals. Build a dream homeland and settle down? Of course, you can! Unlock the ancient seal to finally free yourself? If you want it, you got it!

Build, Farm & Develop!


Have a unique construction experience that features mortise-and-tenon joints.



Build your own paddy fields to grow rice! Pour your heart and soul into the seeds until a bountiful harvest has sprouted from the ground! Maintain the paddy by controlling its water irrigation, fertilizers, and temperature. Good luck and have a happy harvest celebration.

Chop it down and Mine it out!


Gather resources by logging, mining, and gathering to craft your tools. Your future is in your hands!
Buckle up and immerse yourself in surviving the wild. Feed your mouth and keep an eye on your hydration, body temperature, and sanity while dealing with dangers: harsh weather, poisoning, beasts, enemies, and more.

Explore, Discover, and Get Surprised!


Each time you start anew, a brave new world awaits! Don't miss the stunning views and friendly NPCs while seeking the truth of the ruins. Perhaps there's an unexpected surprise waiting for you.

Rally Allies and Stay Strong


Stronger together! United, you shall stand!

Rally your allies and friends to fight the terrible Jaer cultists. They'll share your burden of hard work and the joy of harvest!

data.short_description: Pathless Woods is a sandbox-style game that features exploration, construction, and farming. Travel freely across this land and venture into its mystery. Build a homeland that only existed in your imagination while enjoying productive activities such as farming, logging, hunting and brewing.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.0 Ghz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 GPU with 2GB of memory (GTX 960 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
